title: The Prison Escape: Episode 208
description:
In 1987, John Kendall was serving an 8 years stretch at Gartree Prison near Leicester. But he didn't want to continue to stay in the regimented environment and plotted to escape. With Â£250,000 and a network of contacts, on 10 December, it was time for the plan to be activated.

In this episode of the UK True Crime podcast, I tell the stories of the men involved in the escape and what happened to them.....
